fields.title:
Welcome! ðŸ˜€
We are a team of researchers conducting a study about life and opinions of young people in India. In the coming weeks, we will share with you some nice and short videoclips that you can watch for free. We will also ask you some questions about them.

Meanwhile you have the opportunity to PLAY A QUIZ GAME to find out how much you know about SEX!

To start the quiz please click on the Accept button below.

By clicking the Accept button, you confirm you have read and accept the General Terms and Conditions available at the link below.
https://goo.gl/gTZX7N

Welcome!
How old are you?
We are sorry, but you are either too young or too old to take part to this game.
Before the quiz, we are going to ask you 12 questions about you and your everyday life. The survey will take just 5 minutes of your time. Please try to answer the questions carefully and truthfully.
What is your gender?
What is your current occupation?
What is the highest level of school you attended?
Many young people have boyfriends or girlfriends.  Are you dating someone?
How do you rate your level of English?

Have you ever heard of/watched a web series called "Sex-Ki-Adalat"?

A. Yes, I have heard of it

B. Yes, I have heard and watched it

C. No, I don't know anything about it
Which type of Internet connection do you use most?

How often do you watch videos online (e.g., on Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, etc.)?

A. Every day

B. A few times a week

C. A few times a month

D. Never

Thank you for your time.
Only 4 questions are left!
 
Now we would like to know how you and others feel about the role of women in the society. First, we will ask about your own opinion. Then we will ask you about other peopleâ€™s opinion. 
Keep in mind that your answers will remain confidential.
In your opinion, should a woman be banned from entering the kitchen or household shrine during her period?

Now imagine to pick 10 of your Facebook friends.
 
According to you, how many of them think that a woman should be banned from entering the kitchen or household shrine during her period?
In your opinion, is a husband justified in hitting or beating his wife if he suspects her of being unfaithful?

Now imagine to pick 10 of your Facebook friends.
 
According to you, how many of them think that a husband is justified in hitting or beating his wife if he suspects her of being unfaithful?
Would you be willing to share an anonymous poll on your Facebook wall to know what your friends actually think about the role of women in the society?

Thank you for your time! 
Now it's time to play the game: are you ready?
What's the average number of sex partners for women?
No! Correct answer was 7.5
Correct!
What's the average number of sex partners for men?
No! Correct answer was 7
Correct!
How often are people generally recommended to get checked for Sexually Transmitted Infections?
No! Correct answer was Once a year
Correct!
True or False: Some Sexually Transmitted Infections have no symptoms.
No! Correct answer was False
Correct!
What's the country with the highest rate of non-religious circumcisions?
No! Correct answer was United States
Correct!
Can women get pregnant while on their period?
No! Correct answer was Yes
Correct!
Only men have sexual fantasies.
No! Correct answer was False
Correct!

Great! In the coming days we will let you know about your score and your performance relative to other players. You will have the chance to play other games like this!

We will also send you a short video that you can watch for free.

Thank you for your time!
Done! Your information was sent perfectly.
